content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, glad to meet you. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the newly built condition and prime location of the apartment in the city center, I hope to keep the rental price as economical as possible. What figure are you thinking for monthly rent?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I am thinking of a price that reflects the quality and location of the apartment. Let's say 1500 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I understand the value of this apartment, my budget is rather stringent. I was hoping to find a more affordable option, ideally around 1200 Euros a month. If this proposed price does not work for you, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because affordability is crucial for me at this time.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I understand your concern, but 1200 Euros is too low for this apartment. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are offering is not sufficient for the value of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your response. In that case, I will keep looking for alternative options that better suit my budget. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
